name: Bolt-Thrower
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond that range), passive Perception 14

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The bolt-thrower attacks once with each of its crossbows.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Clockwork Sights
special_abilities.desc: The bolt-thrower does not have disadvantage on attack rolls when making ranged attacks within 5 feet of a hostile creature.

special_abilities.name: Rooted
special_abilities.desc: The bolt-thrower can use a bonus action to anchor itself to or detach itself from a surface. While anchored, the bolt-throwers Speed is 0, and a DC 20 Strength check is required to detach it. A bolt-thrower cannot use its heavy crossbow unless it is anchored.
